subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: R. A. Dickey gave up three home runs and his team’s floundering offense could not bail him out as the Mets, who have decided to switch to a six-man rotation, lost to the Reds.
snippet: R. A. Dickey gave up three home runs and his team’s floundering offense could not bail him out as the Mets, who have decided to switch to a six-man rotation, lost to the Reds.
